scripts.sunet:start: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.sunet:start:node: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.besu.yml up -d
scripts.sunet:stop: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.sunet:stop:node: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.besu.yml down
scripts.sunet:logs: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml logs -f
scripts.sunet:logs:node: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.besu.yml logs -f besu
scripts.sunet:logs:blockscout: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml logs -f backend frontend
scripts.sunet:status: cd sunet && docker compose -f compose/docker-compose.yml ps
